slogan-paragraph: Your App for managing your Homework and Dates!

about-us.heading: About Us
about-us.paragraph: I am a Student who often forgets Homeworks and other Dates. In my School we use multiple different Platforms to manage the Documents and Homework submissions. So I wanted something where everything is in One Place so that I can keep the overview easily.

free.name: Free
free.description: Get All Necessary Features Without Paying A Cent!

premium.name: Premium
premium.description: Go Premium and benefit from extra features!
